workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.0845349130389556 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.1347274546899997 --weight-decay 0.000823712689397623 --lr 0.0006927709217778623 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 164124 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.10540885072055656 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
